
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2025-07-20 00:22:54.900776                #
######################################


#legion #leader_trait_buccaneer_3 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_buccaneer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_defence_engineer #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_defence_engineer_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_defence_engineer
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_defence_engineer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_defence_engineer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_defence_engineer_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_defence_engineer
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_fleet_organizer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_fleet_organizer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_politician_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_politician
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_politician = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_politician }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_politician show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_politician_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician }

	allow = { always = yes }

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_skirmisher } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_skirmisher

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes

			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_skirmisher }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_skirmisher show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {

#legion #leader_trait_trailblazer_3 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_trailblazer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_trailblazer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_trailblazer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_trailblazer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_trailblazer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_trailblazer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {

		}
	}

#legion #leader_trait_armada_logistician_2 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_armada_logistician_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_armada_logistician_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_armada_logistician_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_armada_logistician = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_armada_logistician }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_armada_logistician_2 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_armada_logistician_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_armada_logistician_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_armada_logistician_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_armada_logistician_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_border_guard_2 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_border_guard_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_border_guard_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_border_guard_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_border_guard = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_border_guard }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_border_guard_2 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_border_guard_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_border_guard_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_border_guard_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_border_guard_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_crew_trainer_2 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_crew_trainer_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_crew_trainer_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_crew_trainer_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_crew_trainer = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_crew_trainer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_crew_trainer_2 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_crew_trainer_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_crew_trainer_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_crew_trainer_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_crew_trainer_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_gale_speed_2 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_gale_speed_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_gale_speed_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_gale_speed_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_gale_speed = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_gale_speed }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_gale_speed_2 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_gale_speed_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_gale_speed_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_gale_speed_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_gale_speed_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_guardian_2 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_guardian_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_guardian_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_guardian_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_guardian = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_guardian }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_guardian_2 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_guardian_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_guardian_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_guardian_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_guardian_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_home_guard_2 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_home_guard_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_home_guard_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_home_guard_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_home_guard = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_home_guard }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_home_guard_2 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_home_guard_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_intimidator_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_intimidator_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_intimidator_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_intimidator = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_intimidator }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_intimidator_2 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_intimidator_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_intimidator_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_intimidator_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_armorer #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_armorer_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_armorer } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_armorer
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_armorer = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_armorer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_armorer show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_armorer_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_armorer }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_armorer
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_armorer
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_aturion_organizer #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_aturion_organizer_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_aturion_organizer } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_aturion_organizer
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_aturion_organizer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_aturion_organizer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_aturion_organizer show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_aturion_organizer_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_aturion_organizer }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_aturion_organizer
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_aturion_organizer
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_bellicose #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_bellicose_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_bellicose } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_bellicose
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_bellicose = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_bellicose }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_bellicose show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_bellicose_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_bellicose }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_bellicose
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_bellicose
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_educator #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_educator_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_educator
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes

			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_educator }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_educator show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_educator_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_educator
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_educator
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_master_bureaucrat #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_maven_of_war #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_maven_of_war_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_maven_of_war } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_maven_of_war
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_maven_of_war = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_maven_of_war }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_maven_of_war show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_maven_of_war_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_maven_of_war }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_maven_of_war
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_maven_of_war
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_military_overseer #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_military_overseer_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_military_overseer } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_military_overseer
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_military_overseer = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_military_overseer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_military_overseer show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_military_overseer_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_military_overseer }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_military_overseer
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_military_overseer
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_peacekeeper #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_peacekeeper_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_peacekeeper
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_peacekeeper = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = commander SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_peacekeeper_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_peacekeeper
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}
